1: ni//skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no//de <mistake>laji</mistake> ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin <mistake>zhen//dngos</mistake> grub thams cad rjes chags <mistake>phyir //'dod</mistake> chags chen po bcom ldan 'das//kun grub
2: <mistake>zang</mistake> <mistake>medg</mistake> bde ba yin//bde <mistake>bchen</mistake> po zhes 'dod do//gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste//phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i <mistake>phyir //mchog</mistake> ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po//dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir//dgyes
3: pa dam pa nyi ma ste//sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub <mistake>phyir //thams</mistake> <mistake>can</mistake> bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//rdo rje <mistake>ta</mistake> mchog las nyid <mistake>phyir //sangs</mistake> <mistake>rgyag</mistake> kun dngos sems dpa' <mistake>ste//rdzogssangs</mistake> rgyas
4: <mistake>phyar</mistake> rnam snang mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po//ye shes <mistake>rdorje</mistake> 'dzin mchog phyir//de la ji <mistake>lar /com</mistake> ldan 'das rnam pa gsum <mistake>yid</mistake> <mistake>tsan</mistake> zhe <mistake>na/ 'jig</mistake> rten gsum dag <mistake>mtha'yas</mistake> phyir//
5: 'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum <mistake>bdag /thams</mistake> cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum//'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin
6: <mistake>zhen/soms</mistake> can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir//mi g.yo thams cad <mistake>khon</mistake> <mistake>bdag /sems</mistake> 'du 'bral phyir g.yo ba ste//kun byed <mistake>khams</mistake> <mistake>cang</mistake> kho na'i phyir//mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha mor
7: <mistake>gsungs/thams</mistake> <mistake>cang</mistake> mdzad pas skal ba <mistake>bzang//rnam</mistake> par rtog pa skal <mistake>dan</mistake> par//brda yis mtshan mar gsungs pa'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i
8: <mistake>yi</mistake> shes kyi rgyu yin zhe <mistake>na/gtan</mistake> du srid pa yang dag 'grub//dbang phyug <mistake>chan</mistake> po 'grub don du//dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du//bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs//'dod chags
